translations.text: They say: "When will this Fath be, if you are telling the truth"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And they say: When cometh this victory (of yours) if ye are truthful?

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: They say, ‘When will this judgement be, if you are truthful?’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: They also ask: 'When will this Opening come, if what you say is true'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: They say, "If what you say is true, when will the final triumph come?"

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And they say: When will this judgment take place, If you are truthful?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alfathu in kuntum sadiqeena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: And they say, "When will this judgement come, if you are telling the truth?"

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: They say: "When will this decision be, if ye are telling the truth?"

verses.text: قُلْ‌ يَوْمَ‌ الْفَتْحِ‌ لاَ يَنْفَعُ‌ الَّذِينَ‌ کَفَرُوا إِيمَانُهُمْ‌ وَ لاَ هُمْ‌ يُنْظَرُونَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: بگو: روز فتح و پیروزی [حتمی مؤمنان] کسانی که کفر ورزیده اند، نه ایمان آوردنشان سودشان دهد و نه به آنان مهلت داده می شود؛

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: بگو: در روز پيروزى، ايمان آوردن كافران سودشان ندهد، و مهلتشان ندهند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: بگو: روز فتح، ايمان كسانى كه كافر شدند سودى نمى‌دهد و مهلت داده نمى‌شوند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: بگو: «روز پيروزى، ايمان كسانى كه كافر شده‌اند سود نمى‌بخشد و آنان مهلت نمى‌يابند.»

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: بگو که (امروز باید ایمان آرید که) روز فتح، ایمان آنان که کافر بودند سود نبخشد و آنها را مهلت ندهند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: بگو: در روز فیصله (ی کار) و قضاوت (پروردگار، کار از کار می‌گذرد و) ایمان آوردن کفّار سودی به حالشان ندارد و (لحظه‌ای از دست عذاب) بدیشان مهلت داده نمی‌شود. [[«یَوْمَ الْفَتْحِ»: (نگا: سجده / 28).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: بگو روز داوری کافران را ایمانشان سود ندهد و به آنان مهلت ندهند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: بگو: «روز پیروزی، ایمان آوردن، سودی به حال کافران نخواهد داشت؛ و به آنها هیچ مهلت داده نمی‌شود!»

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: بگو روز پیروزی سود ندهد آنان را که کفر ورزیدند ایمانشان و نه مهلت داده شوند

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: بگو: در روز پيروزى، آنان را كه كافر شدند ايمان آوردنشان سود ندهد و نه مهلت داده شوند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: بگو: «روز گشایش، ایمانِ کسانی که کافر شده‌اند سودی نمی‌بخشد و آنان مهلت (هم) نمی‌یابند.»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Say: "Of no use will be the acceptance of belief to unbelievers on the Day of Decision, nor will they be granted respite.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Proclaim, “On the Day of Decision*, the disbelievers will not benefit from their accepting faith, nor will they get respite.” (* Of death or of resurrection)

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Say: 'On the Day of Victory their faith shall not profit the unbelievers, nor shall they be respited.'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Say thou: on the day of the Decision their belief will not profit those who have disbelieved; nor will they be respited.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Say: "On the Day of Al-Fath (Decision), no profit will it be to those who disbelieve if they (then) believe! Nor will they be granted a respite."

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Say, “On the day of victory, the faith of those who disbelieved will be of no avail to them, and they will not be granted respite.”

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Tell them: “If the unbelievers were to believe on the Day of Judgement that will not avail them. For then they will be granted no respite.”

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Say: "On the Day of Al-Fath, no profit will it be to those who disbelieve if they (then) believe! Nor will they be granted a respite."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Say (unto them): On the day of the victory the faith of those who disbelieve (and who then will believe) will not avail them, neither will they be reprieved.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Say, ‘On the day of judgement their [newly found] faith will not avail the faithless, nor will they be granted any respite.’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Say: 'On the Day of Opening the faith of the unbelievers will not benefit them, nor shall they be respited'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved."

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Say, "On the day of the final triumph, the faith of the disbelievers will be of no avail to them, nor will they be given any respite".

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Say: On the day of judgment the faith of those who (now) disbelieve will not profit them, nor will they be respited.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Qul yawma alfathi la yanfaAAu allatheena kafaroo eemanuhum wala hum yuntharoona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Say, "On the Day of Judgement it will be of no benefit to those who were bent on denying the truth, if they [then] believe! They will be granted no respite."

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Say: "On the Day of Decision, no profit will it be to Unbelievers if they (then) believe! nor will they be granted a respite."

verses.text: فَأَعْرِضْ‌ عَنْهُمْ‌ وَ انْتَظِرْ إِنَّهُمْ‌ مُنْتَظِرُونَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: بنابراین از آنان روی برگردان و منتظر [رسیدن پیروزی] باش که آنان هم [به گمان خود] منتظرند [که بر شما پیروز شوند.]

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پس، از ايشان اعراض كن و منتظر باش، كه آنها نيز در انتظارند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس، از ايشان روى برتاب و منتظر باش كه آنها نيز در انتظارند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پس، از ايشان روى برتاب و منتظر باش كه آنها نيز در انتظارند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: پس از آن کافران اعراض و دوری کن و منتظر (فتح و فیروزی خدا) باش، که آنها هم منتظر (قوّت خویش و ضعف و شکست تو) هستند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: (ای پیغمبر! اکنون که چنین است و استهزاء و تمسخر، کار همیشگی کافرین است) به ایشان اهمّیّت مده (و به تبلیغ خود ادامه بده) و منتظر (یاری خدا و شکست مشرکان) باش، چرا که ایشان هم منتظر (شکست و هلاک تو و مؤمنان) هستند. [[«أَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ»: از آنان روی بگردان. بدیشان اهمّیّت مده.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس از آنان روی بگردان و منتظر باش که آنان نیز منتظرند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: حال که چنین است، از آنها روی بگردان و منتظر باش؛ آنها نیز منتظرند! (تو منتظر رحمت خدا و آنها هم منتظر عذاب او!)

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس روی برتاب از ایشان و منتظر باش که ایشانند منتظران‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس، از آنها روى بگردان و منتظر باش، كه آنان نيز منتظرند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس، از ایشان روی برتاب و منتظر باش. بی‌گمان آنان (نیز) منتظرانند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Therefore turn away from them and wait as they are waiting.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Therefore turn away from them and wait – indeed they too have to wait.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: So turn thou away from them, and wait; they too are waiting.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Wherefore turn aside thou from them, and await; verily they are awaiting.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: So turn aside from them (O Muhammad SAW) and await, verily they (too) are awaiting.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: So turn away from them, and wait. They too are waiting.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: So (leave them to themselves and) turn away from them and wait; they too are waiting.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: So turn aside from them and await, verily, they (too) are awaiting.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad), and await (the event). Lo! they (also) are awaiting (it).

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: So turn away from them, and wait. They too are waiting.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Therefore turn away from them, and wait, they are waiting.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Turn away from them and wait. They are, also, waiting.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Therefore turn away from them and wait, surely they too are waiting.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: FaaAArid AAanhum waintathir innahum muntathiroona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: So turn away from them and wait. They too are waiting.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: So turn away from them, and wait: they too are waiting.
